snippet.title: Sporos - a simple yet challenging puzzle game by Appxplore
snippet.description:
Sporos will be available in February 2013 on the App Store and Google Play. For more information, please visit www.appxplore.com. LIKE us @ facebook.com/appxplore.

Sporos is a simple yet challenging puzzle game. The objective is to light up the cells in each level with a special seed known as the sporos. Players drag pieces onto the board one at a time, arranging them to extend all the way down every row and column. Sporos demands a mix of skill, luck, and logic; in order to succeed, players will conduct clever experiments like scientists in a lab. The soothing electronic music helps you keep your cool, while the colorful graphics lend the game a spacey, biological vibe. Sporos starts off easy, but with hundreds of levels and multiple solutions for each, it will take a true puzzle genius to master this stylish, colorful app. 

FEATURES:

Simple-yet-challenging puzzle gaming
Futuristic theme with neon "biological" graphics
300 levels in Essential Labs -- starts off simple and gets increasingly tricky
200 extra levels in Experimental Labs -- mutated sporos put your skills to the test!
Universal iOS app for iPhone & iPad, also available for Android devices
Game Center support with 20 Achievements
Scoreloop support with 20 Achievements for Android version
Hints for purchase, just in case you get stuck
More levels in the months to come!
